title: Bug 5340 - Cancelling add exception breakpoint has no effect
OB: When adding an exception breakpoint in the debug perspective, if the cancel button is clicked in the progress dialog, the exception list still appears. It should either honor the cancellation request or disable the cancel button. Currently, the progress dialog closes immediately and the cancellation is ignored.
EB: When adding an exception breakpoint in the debug perspective, if the cancel button is clicked in the progress dialog, the exception list should not appear. The cancellation request should be honored, or the cancel button should be disabled. The progress dialog should stay open until the operation is complete.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1) Go to the breakpoints pane in the debug perspective. 2) Click the "J!" button to add an exception. 3) In the progress dialog, click cancel.
